data.name: Rugby Challenge 4
data.detailed_description:
GET INTO THE CHALLENGE!

The focus for Rugby Challenge 4 has been to build on and improve the gameplay of our previous rugby games while retaining its essence with the use of the original signature animations, now spectacularly enhanced by the Unreal Engine.

RC4 is here to give you the best rugby experience of all time!

  • NEW! Catch your rivals off guard using set plays with 10 different moves, including cross-kick!
  • NEW! Women’s Sevens Rugby with 16 international teams, including 5 licensed teams.
  • NEW! Make the ultimate rugby player with both the kit creator and the enhanced player creator!
  • NEW! AI formations and improved positioning of players making the game more realistic and challenging for those experienced rugby heads.
  • NEW! Side-line camera angle and drop goal camera allowing for closer simulation to a real broadcast view.
  • CROSS-PLATFORM FANHUB Share, download and rate players and teams using our famous Fanhub across all platforms!
  • ALL-STAR COMMENTARY Real sports broadcasting commentary with Grant Nisbett and Justin Marshall. French commentary by Eric Bayle and Thomas Lombard.
  • ​THE DEFINITIVE RUGBY EXPERIENCE Multiple Game Modes including: Single Match, Multi-team Competition, extensive multi-year Career Mode and Be a Pro Mode
  • OVER 12 PRESTIGIOUS COMPETITIONS Including the all new Womens 7’s Rugby, Premiership Rugby, Super Rugby Mens 7’s Rugby, and Currie Cup - or even create your own!

* Internet connection required to play Rugby Challenge 4

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core™ I3-3210 / AMD Phenom II X4 960T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i5-4430 CPU / AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.ext_user_account_notice: Rugby Challenge 4 FanHub Account required for accessing Cross Platform FanHub content but is not required for play.
